article:
He met her at a party. She was outstanding while he was normal. At the end of the party, he invited her to have coffee. She was   _  but due to
being polite, she  _  . Sitting in a nice
coffee shop, he was too  _  to say
anything.
Suddenly he asked the   _  , "Would you please give me some salt? I'd like to put it in my
coffee." Everybody stared at him, so  _  !
His face turned red but still, he put the salt in his coffee and drank it. She
asked him  _  , "Why you have this
hobby?" He replied, "When I was a little boy, I lived near the sea. I
liked the  _  of the sea, just like
the taste of the salty coffee.  Every time  I
have the salty coffee, I always  think of  my
childhood and my hometown. I miss my hometown and my parents."  _  saying that tears filled his eyes. She was deeply touched. A man who
can tell out hishomesickness must  be  a  man  who  has  _  of home.
That was a really beautiful   _  of their story. Then the story was just like every beautiful  love
 story -- the  princess   _  the  prince. And  every
 time  she  made  _  for
him, she put some salt in it, as she knew that's the  _  he liked it.
After 40 years, he passed away,   _  her a letter which said, "My dearest, please forgive me, forgive
my whole life's lie -- the salty coffee. Remember the first time we dated? I was
so nervous at that time,  _  I wanted
some sugar, but I said salt. It was hard for me  to  _  so I just went ahead. If I can live for the second time, I still want
to have you for my whole life,  even though  I
have to drink the salty coffee again."
Her tears made the letter totally wet. Someday, someone asked her, "What's  the  taste  of   _  coffee? " She replied, " It's sweet."
